============
Introduction
============

``piestore`` is A Python API for RESTful Store Services.


Objectives
----------


Installing
----------

Install and update using `pip`:

.. code-block:: bash

   pip install -U piestore


A Simple Example
----------------

.. code-block:: python

   from piestore import App

   app = App()

   def _say(interjection='I like', noun='Pies'):
       return app.say(interjection, noun)
